categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic intelligence organizations

nodes.text: Triage was a department within the Analysis office of the Intentions branch of Alliance Intelligence. Triage was created with one goal; to pre-judge incoming intelligence information on its potential useful, discarding and filing data that appeared to not be immediately relevant or important. While vital information was undoubtedly overlooked, the system ensured that the Analysis office could function without losing itself under the gigabits of information they had to analyze.
